Subject: Nice site, quick question...
Message:
I just wondered if you've planned any marketing yet for the new year for you're site.  I am self-employed doing this for various businesses for a number of years now, I feed my family doing it so I won't complain.  I have a way of getting immediate interested traffic and buyers to your site through social media channels and email.  As well as getting more likes, followers for all of your social accounts.  I have a new program that has just been completed that listens to all tweets being made, if a certain word or phrase is detected, we instantly send back to them a tweet that they should visit our site.  We can use as many search terms as we want, 100's of targeted visits a day.  I can even help you make a site, fix site errors add updates etc. if you might need it.

In addition to that, I'd also like to find out what your competitors have done that we havn't done yet and address those issues asap.  I'd also like to make a video or 2 about your site and get them to rank high pretty quickly.  Lastly I have a large database of opt in customers that are interested in what it is you do, so if you'd like to expand your current newsletter list let me know, I can get you these records whenever you'd like them.  They would get you instant leads by supplying you with a list of people or businesses that are looking for exactly what it is you're offering.

I use tools that a lot of people dont know about or don't have time to use for themselves and would like to use them for your site.  If your to busy with current clients I get it, I was just wondering was all.  Let me know if youd like more information or references, I have more than I know what to do with.

Winston
1.319.423.9473

Subject: The test I ran that instantly boosted my conversion...
Message:
Check this out... I've been running a lot of tests on my website recently to see what I could do to increase leads and sales.  I realized I wasn't using FOMO and I noticed you aren’t either. 

Fear of missing out or FOMO, really gets people to take action. 

I ran a split test to see how effective it would be. One page didn't have Proof on it, the other did. That was the only difference and guess what... The page with Proof got 23% more leads than the one without it!

I thought this tool would help you too. I'm by no means "techy" and I was still able to install it myself pretty quickly, and if you have any trouble their customer success team is AMAZING.

Subject: Please which platform is this? All submissions should sent via the IIA platform
Message:
Delivery Requirements
Name
The Provision of Ports and Harbour Agency Services
Scope
Tullow Ghana Limited (TGL) operates two offshore oil and gas concessions, namely Jubilee and TEN. Apart from the two FPSOs in each field, the operations have been further expanded with the arrival of a drillship in January 2018, and the possibility for a second later within 2018. In order to maintain continuity of operations in support of these offshore activities, TGL will tranship equipment, materials and personnel to these offshore locations via contracted supply vessels, currently from the ports of Takoradi, Sekondi and occasionally Time. TGL will thus requires an experienced and competent shipping agency to provide port and harbour agency services with respect to managing and expediting the port calls of Tullow vessels contracted to service the assets offshore
Contract Duration
3years
Invitation to Tender and any other Related Documentation
Scope of Work for Ports and Harbour Agency Services
Allow Petroleum Commission oversight

Submission Requirements
Application Deadline
21/03/2018 05:00:00
Selection Date
07/09/2018

Method of Submission
All submissions should sent via the IIA platform.  Please which platform is this?

Subject: Advertising Opportunities on africanpartnerpool.com
Message:
Hi there,
 
My name is Cindy, and I'm doing some public relations work for a site in a similar niche to yourselves.
 
I represent a couple of 'review' businesses in the sector, and am looking to secure some advertising placements, following a set format, for my clients and just wanted to confirm what options you had available.
 
We're looking for (and naturally have budget for) placements of at least 24 months and preferably 24+ ('permanent') which meets the following criteria:
A new article on your site, written by us, on a topic of your choice that's useful to your site and readers:
It would contain one, followed link, to my client,
It would not be tagged 'guest post' or 'sponsored' or anything similar,
It must appear/be linked to from the main category pages so it can be indexed/found but doesn't need to be 'pinned' or remain at the top of the category,
I will work with you to ensure the article is one you find truly valuable
 
If you're able to offer pricing then I'd love to work with you on getting some advertising sent your way. Please just let me know in your reply that our terms are acceptable, and what price you would like in order to work with us.
 
Cheers,
 
Cindy
 
ps Don't worry - I haven't kept you on a list or anything like that - if you're not interested you won't hear from me again!

Subject: APPLICATION AS AN ACCOUNTS OR AUDIT STAFF
Message:
"An Audit and Finance Professional with more than three (3) years extensive experience in the preparation, auditing, analysing and presentation of financial statements and budgets now seeks a more challenging yet rewarding opportunity in your highly esteemed organization. I am a versatile and dynamic person who is able to assimilate quickly into a highly, dynamic and demanding environment. Always calm under pressure with the ability to work for longer hours with little or no supervision. Subject: partnership inquiry in Ethiopia
Message:
Subject: Partnership inquiry in Ethiopia
 
Dear Sirs/Madam, Director/Founder/CEO /Representative 
 
Resilience Ethiopia (RE), Institute for Healthy lives, Livelihood Systems and Ecology in Ethiopia, has been registered and licensed by the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia Charities and Societies Agency as an Ethiopian Resident Charity in accordance with Proclamation No.621/2009 with registration number 2895 to operate at national level.
 
Resilience Ethiopia (RE) is accountable to General Assembly that convenes once year. Under the Assembly there is an Executive Board composed of 7 members of various professional mix, which meets once every quarter. RE has a secretariat vested with the responsibility of planning, executing and following up the day-to-day activities of the organization headed by the Executive Director.
 
Our Organization Vision: Inspiring to see sustainable lives, livelihood Systems and Ecology in Ethiopia. 
 
Our Organization Mission:
+        Provide the means for the pro-poor to attain education, health, and  sustainable livelihood  leading to independence while honoring personhood, lives, eco-village, livelihood, ecology, culture and individual’s esteem to self determination.
 
+        Develop enterprising solutions and institutionalized response for lost and marginalized children, child trafficking victims, children of drug abuse families, street children and the children of prisoners.
 
+        Sponsor action research related to school based organic farming practices, to disseminate research results, to organic farmers and growers interested in adopting organic production systems.
 
+        Promote Demonstrative Eco Friendly Schools Eco-Villages: Environmentally and socially sustainable settlements
 
+        Transform child health through knowledge, innovation and expertise.
Organizational focus areas are the following
 
1. Education (Integrated Transformational Functional Adult Literacy, Inclusive Education, Pastoralist Education, Access Education, Educational Fostering, Mobile Education and Assertive Tutorial Classes)
 
2.Health ( Reproductive Health & Ethics, Family Planning,  Malaria, Tropical Disease Control/Tsetse Fly Control, Non-Communicable Disease, HIV and AIDS, Environmental Sanitation & Personal Hygiene, Latrine Dev’t, Water Borne Disease, Maternal and Child Health Care, and Harmful Traditional Practices,)
 
3. Ecology (Bio-Ethics, Eco-Employment , Carbon Trading ,Responsible Mining, Conservation Agriculture , Watershed Dev’t , Field Gene Bank Dev’t, Climate Change Mitigation & Adaptation ,Environmental Protection & Rehabilitation, Buffer Zone , Homestead Dev’t , Organic Farming and School Greening)
 
4. Alternative, Sustainable & Clean Energy Development (Biogas Development, Solar Energy Development, Metrological Centre Dev’t, Bio-Latrine Dev’t, and Dry & Wet Waste Management and Recycling)
 
5. Water (Spring Dev’t, Water Point Dev’t, Public Shower Dev’t, and Remote School Roof Water Harvesting)
 
6. Livelihood (Bee-Keeping, Intensive Farming, Poultry, Animal Raising, Rural Credit, Marketable Livelihood Skill Training, Improved Seed Multiplication, Fair Trade, and Post Harvest Lost Mgt)
 
7.Family Therapy (Child Dev’t, Positive Parenting, Orphans and Other Vulnerable Children Direct Support, Day Care, Family Counseling , Nutrition & Dietetics, Micronutrient,  Elder’s Guardian’s Self Help Group Support and ART Adherence) and Senior Citizen Support.
 8. Arts and culture
Now the organization cooperates with Universities, Schools, Networks, Forums, Consortiums, Foundations, Dev’t Organizations, Community Based Organizations, Faith Based Organizations, Government, Media, and with Communities.
8. Direct Cash Transfer (DCT) with soft conditaionalities to the ultra-poor community in bottom of socio-economic change 
9. Sports for development program in Ethiopia 
10. Culture and development
11. Building Minds through School construction and training  






Thus, therefore Resilience Ethiopia’s (RE) would like to request your esteemed organization to apply for funds to support local innovation to down scale the desolation of endangered lives, livelihood and ecology in Ethiopia. Resilience Ethiopia profoundly believes women and partnership makes the world go round. Social change doesn’t happen overnight, nor does it happen alone. We welcome the opportunity to work together with like-minded foundations and philanthropic sources, the corporate and community sectors, government agencies and individuals to pool resources and intertwine our efforts. We will work tirelessly to build our partnerships on trust, respect and results with both our grantees and our resource partners.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Favorite Scripture: "All the believers were one in heart and mind. No one claimed that any of their possessions was their own, but they shared everything they had." Acts 4:32    
“Much is required from the person to whom much is given.”  Luke 12:48. Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much ― Helen Keller







Thank you for your positive reply, concern and mutual partnership.
 
Blessings,   

MesayTadese   

CEO
 
Resilience Ethiopia  and  Energy Globe GMBH Austria Special Representative in Ethiopia, Vice chairperson of the Ethiopian sociology, anthropology and social work association (ESSSWA)- south Ethiopia chapter 
 
Resilience Ethiopia is an international affiliate of:
1.     Rainforest Alliance
2.     Greenpeace International
3.     Pro-Literacy international
4.     Social Change Network
5.     RAIN Foundation
6.     Bees For Development
7.     Nurses for the Environment
8.     Citizens for Health
9.     Teach A Man to Fish
10.  Rural Water Supply Network
11.  Pro-Poor.org
12.  SEEP Network
13.  International Network of Pesticide Action
14.  Sustainable Sanitation Alliance (SuSANA )
15.  AF NGOs Network
16.  ACFID
17.  Global Nomads
18.  Forum For The Future
19.  Climate Action Network International
20. The Guardian Environment Network
21. PRIME - Partnerships in International Medical Education
 
"We are all made to be awesome! The road to awesome goes through contribution"
 christina.mensah@investinafrica.com

Subject: Subsea Support Vessel For TOTAL Nigeria
Message: We are Brizins Integrated Company Limited.  We bided for a Subsea support vessel contract for TOTAL offshore with DOF Subsea Vessel named SKANDI SKOLTEN which is now sold.  The former Managing Director Mr Corbetta forwarded the vessel document to us and now the commercial is on going.  Our problem is that Mr Corbetta has left your company, so we will like to discuss with you, if the need arises we will come to Ghana to discuss the modalities with you. If we win, we will want DOF Subsea to substitute the sold vessel for this contract.  The duration of this contract is 2 years firm and 1 year extension option, the commencement date for this contract is 4th quarter 2017.

Subject: Lubricant Manufacturer looking for Distributor(s) in Ghana
Message:
Good afternoon,
I've read with interest about African Partner Pool and would like to check whether you are able to help us identify potential distributors in Ghana re: the marketing & sales of our high performance industrial & automotive lubricants?
LE International is the global sales agent for the US manufacturer Lubrication Engineers, Inc and we currently have a worldwide network of more than 60 distributors - including Morocco, Tunisia, Egypt, South Africa & Zimbabwe in Africa. However we have not been successful in appointing a distributor in Ghana.
http://www.le-international.com/distribution-opportunities.html
Look forward to your feedback.

Kind regards
Angus
Director
Lubrication Engineers International Ltd

Subject: SME TRAINING COLLABORATION
Message:
18 July, 2015

To 

Benjamin Manu 
APP Manager
F84/8 Aborlebu Crecsent, 
Labone, Cantonments, Accra, 
Ghana
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Justang and associates is the trading name of Justang Limited, a limited liability company registered in Ghana. Justang and associates is an approved centre of City and Guilds and the Institute of leadership and Management both in the UK. 

Justang and associates was established to help in the development of executives by providing personalized leadership framework that empowers executives to continually evolve as effective and efficient leaders who creates value for their organizations and stakeholders. Our expertise is in the area of leadership and management training, entrepreneurship training, coaching and mentoring training. 

I strongly believe our vision and mission are in line with that of invest in Africa which is to help African business grow. As a specialist training provider we have helped both corporate and individual clients in developing themselves and shaping their organisation through our trainings. Participants work through the skills needed to manage their teams effectively and make sure they are achieving organisational goals. 

I have observed on your website that, your organisation helps train SMEs in skills training. As an approved city and guilds centre, you can be assured we have all the courses and expertise in skills training because city and guilds is the world’s largest vocational qualification skills provider in the world. Aside this we design and tailor make training programs based on need analysis.

Going forward, we are always looking for collaborative partners in the areas of training in leadership, management, entrepreneurship, coaching and mentoring and vocational skills straining. Based on this brief introductory, 

This letter has been written with the intent of officially requesting for an appointment to meet with management on how we can work together and support your quest in training SMEs. I look forward to hearing from you regarding your availability to meet at earliest. Please confirm the earliest date and share with us on info@justangassociates.com or you can contact Solomon Nartey on 0541946895

We look forward to receiving your esteemed support in this regard.

Sincerely,

Solomon Nartey

Subject: Business networks
Message:
I write to introduce to you BluDot Digit­al. BluDot Digital is an integrated digital marketing consultancy that speciali­ses in using a range of digital assets t­o aid and improve the business performan­ce of organisations. We are mainly into the management of Facebook accounts for companies. Would like to know if APP can be of help in connecting or recommending us to companies to serve as their digital marketing partner?
We have been receiving tender from APP but none fit in our line of business. 
Waiting for you prompt response. Thank you.
